intro.label: About
intro.bio: Born in Venezuela, Robeanny Bastardo Liconte has built a solid career in the modeling world. With a modern vision of style and a magnetic personality, she continues to leave her mark on every project.

cta.subtitle: Available for editorial, commercial, and runway bookings worldwide.

meta.homeTitle: Robeanny Bastardo Liconte | Professional Model Colombia — Portfolio, Booking & Sessions
meta.homeDesc: Robeanny Bastardo Liconte — Professional model in Medellín, Colombia. Editorial portfolio, photo sessions, booking for commercial campaigns, runway, and fashion content.
